description: (ECC) PIMS:3467-Pakistan Productive Use of Renewable Energy in Chitral District, Pakistan (PURE- Chitral)

subproject.description:
1. Development of 15 MW of MHP schemes for PUE in the 103 sites selected in the PURE-Chitral projecT. 2.Development of productive uses of energy model (PUE) in the 103 selected areas. 3. Strengthened capacity for MHP planning and watershed management 
4. Conditions for project sustainability are established. 5. Monitoring, Learning and Feedback
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: ECC-Productive Use of RE
